ygData.subject: Re: Duel Wield Preferences

ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 Jan 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
>
> When you calculate ratios for weapons do you use the base damage or
> damx2+1.
>
> In other words your 6/23 sword:
> DO you use .261 (6/23)
> or .565 (13/23)?
>
> It does make a difference. I am asking because my lvl 16 bard seems to

Yes it makes a difference. That's why I recommend you parse
your logfiles. I woudln't be surprised if they coded it so
that the best weapon at a certain str/dex/sta was not the best
weapon at a different str/dex/sta.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
